mapper.sql: fileCatalog.id, fileCatalog.user_id, fileCatalog.parent_id, fileCatalog.name, fileCatalog.level, fileCatalog.rel_scn_dsc, fileCatalog.create_date, fileCatalog.update_date, fileCatalog.icon, fileCatalog.mark, fileCatalog.scope, fileCatalog.comments
mapper.select: select fileCatalog.id, fileCatalog.user_id, fileCatalog.parent_id, fileCatalog.name, fileCatalog.level, fileCatalog.rel_scn_dsc, fileCatalog.create_date, fileCatalog.update_date, fileCatalog.icon, fileCatalog.mark, fileCatalog.scope, fileCatalog.comments, (select count(1) from base_file_catalog cc where cc.parent_id=fileCatalog.id and (cc.scope='global' or (cc.scope='person' and cc.user_id=#{userId}))) as childCount from base_file_catalog fileCatalog where parent_id =#{catalogId} and (fileCatalog.scope='global' or (fileCatalog.scope='person' and fileCatalog.user_id=#{userId})) order by name asc

select fileInfo.file_id, fileInfo.size, fileInfo.mime_type, fileInfo.sha1, fileInfo.store_type, fileInfo.suffix, fileInfo.path, fileBsn.upload_user_id, fileBsn.upload_user_name, fileBsn.upload_date, fileBsn.display_name, fileBsn.seq_index from base_file_bsn fileBsn left join base_file_info fileInfo on(fileBsn.file_id=fileInfo.file_id) where fileBsn.bsn_id=#{catalogId} and fileBsn.bsn_type='catalog' order by fileBsn.display_name asc,fileBsn.upload_date asc
